column14: LXRX is a pretty good bet Shorties cannot sell a bridge to nowhere forever Only UP from temporarily suppressed 7 price Seems CRAZY that price drops below 7 and short interest actually increased AFTER EMA approval in DM type I Shorties got their games and short on low volume after good news including after recent May 15th positive CEO presentation Too bad Shorties InvusArtal and I have plenty of patience and time Suggest Shorties get out while getting good
